\def\enhance<#1>{%
 \temporal<#1>{\color{lightgray}}{\color{black}}{\color{gray}}}
\def\enhanceus<#1>{%
 \temporal<#1>{\color{lightgray}}{\color{blue}}{\color{blue}}}
\def\enhancenewus<#1>{%
 \temporal<#1>{\color{lightgray}}{\color{magenta}}{\color{magenta}}}
\def\enhancethem<#1>{%
 \temporal<#1>{\color{lightgray}}{\color{red}}{\color{red}}}
